text:
Hotjar is a young startup that embraces remote working and personal development.

Hotjar's culture is driven by transparency, respect, open discussion, collaboration and blunt and direct feedback. We're currently hiring for:

Hotjar | DevOps Engineer (Europe) | Remote https://careers.hotjar.com/o/devops-engineer-europe

Information about all roles can be found on our careers page: http://careers.hotjar.com/
